duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead projects and manage all activities in a project life cycle associated with projects that are typically department-focused and/or lower in risk, scope, and complexity.
Understand project goals, analyze risk, and provide technical support to ensure the project meets established deadlines.
Produce functional requirements, business requirements, use cases, and workflows to facilitate and maintain technical and project documentation.
Participate in the planning, design, and implementation of business process improvement projects.
Monitor project progress by tracking activity, resolving problems, publishing progress reports, and recommending actions.
Assist in the definition of test conditions and development of accurate and complete test plans. Identify and document system deficiencies and recommend solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or a related field is required. Relevant certification(s) strongly preferred (PMP, CBAP, etc.)
